HOME.TITLE: I'm André, FrontEnd Mobile & Web Developer
HOME.ABOUT_ME_DESCRIPTION: I'm a diligent person with knowledge in differents development areas such as Frontend y Backend.
HOME.MY_WORK_DESCRIPTION: I have worked in many diffente companies and by my own, getting knowledge in web development with Angular and mobile with Ionic and native Android.

ABOUT_ME.TITLE: About Me
ABOUT_ME.PERSONAL_SKILLS_DESCRIPTION: I'm a person with initiative, motivation, responsability and commitment to get solution to any issue.
ABOUT_ME.DEVELOPER_DESCRIPTION: I'm specialized in FrontEnd development, however I also have knowledge in BackEnd and databases, and I have professional experience with the next programming languages.
ABOUT_ME.FRAMEWORKS_AND_TECHNOLOGIES_DESCRIPTION: I have experiencie in Mobile Application Development, Web Apps and API's, also experience using technologies such as cloud tools (databases, analytics, etc).
ABOUT_ME.EXTRA_TOOLS_DESCRIPTION: I have knowledge with various tools and technologies which help me to expand how many functionalities one project will have.

MY_PROJECTS.TITLE: Projects I have participated
MY_PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION: These are some of the projects in which I have participated, such as in mobile application development and web development and some others that I describe in my resume.

ROTARY.TITLE: Rotary Club Mante
ROTARY.DESCRIPTION: Webpage developed in Angular, with the goal to announce Rotary Club from Mante, Tamaulipas, México as well as their events and activities.

OXXO.TITLE: mi OXXO App
OXXO.DESCRIPTION: App developed in Android, which make fast payments, air time recharges, shows products promotions and coupons also delivery service.

COMENZANDO_JUNTOS.TITLE: Comenzando Juntos
COMENZANDO_JUNTOS.DESCRIPTION: Web application developed in AngularJS, API in .NET hosted in Azure, FEMSA project as strategy to promote children's development.

WIBE.TITLE: Wibe App - BBVA
WIBE.DESCRIPTION: App developed in Android, makes contracts and quotes for cars and motorcycles insurance, among other features.

CEMEX_GO_DRIVER.TITLE: CEMEX Go Driver
CEMEX_GO_DRIVER.DESCRIPTION: App developed in Android, electronic management of deliveries of branded product for drivers use to manage their deliveries.

SQUIRK.TITLE: Squirk
SQUIRK.DESCRIPTION: Landing page developed in Angular and Firebase, with the goal to transform visitants to product customer of lubricant Squirk with prospect to become potential wholesalers.

ABOLENGOS.TITLE: CBA
ABOLENGOS.DESCRIPTION: App developed in Ionic + Angular and Supabase, with the goal to have a record and make events reservations of many client's villa rental, developed from scratch by me.

OLD_PORTFOLIO.TITLE: University Portfolio
OLD_PORTFOLIO.DESCRIPTION: Webpage developed in HTML, CSS and JS as my first university portfolio, with the goal to show my projects and achievements during my stay at university.

ME.ABOUT_ME: Software Developer with 3 years of professional experience in native mobile applications using Android Studio (Kotlin and Java), as well as over a year of experience in FrontEnd Web development (Angular).

WORK_TOGETHER.TITLE: Let's work together
WORK_TOGETHER.DESCRIPTION: If you are interested in working with me, please contact me.

BY.TITLE: Developed by André Ibarra Pérez with Angular 16 and Bootstrap 5 in 2023.
